message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I think it's a fair price considering what you'll gain from it.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer. While $18,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. While $15,000 is closer to what I'm willing to pay, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it will bring to me.
